text: ab moosa hamaare nishchit kie hue samay par pahuncha aur usake rab ne usase baaten kee, to vah karane laga, "mere rab! mujhe dekhane kee shakti pradaan kar ki main tujhe dekhoon." kaha, "too mujhe kadaapi na dekh sakega. haan, pahaad kee or dekh. yadi vah apane sthaan par sthir par sthir rah jae to phir too mujhe dekh lega." atev jab usaka rab pahaad par prakat hua to use chakanaachoor kar diya aur moosa moorchhit hokar gir pada. phir jab hosh mein aaya to kaha, "mahima hai teree! main tere samajh tauba karata hoon aur sabase pahala eemaan laanevaala main hoon.
